locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf110 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 The name of the client is insomniat under /usr/local/bin\ \ You need to manually load the kext after install or reboot to use.\ \ To manually load type in\ \ sudo kextload /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ \ To disable sleep\ \ insomniat --disable\ \ To enable sleep\ \ insomniat --enable\ \ To uninstall \ \ sudo kextunload /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ sudo rm -rf /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ sudo rm /usr/local/bin/insomniat}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf110 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 The name of the client is insomniat under /usr/local/bin\ \ You need to manually load the kext after install or reboot to use.\ \ To manually load type in\ \ sudo kextload /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ \ To disable sleep\ \ insomniat --disable\ \ To enable sleep\ \ insomniat --enable\ \ To uninstall \ \ sudo kextunload /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ sudo rm -rf /System/Library/Extensions/InsomniaT.kext\ sudo rm /usr/local/bin/insomniat}

requirement.message: This Version of the installer requires Mac OS 10.6 or higher
